ingredients.name: Whole Grain Oats
ingredients.description: Whole grain oats are the seeds of the oat plant, which are processed into various forms for consumption.  They're a common breakfast cereal and provide fiber and nutrients.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: Sugar is a common sweetener derived from sugarcane or sugar beets, used in many food products for its flavor and texture.

ingredients.name: MSG
ingredients.description: MSG, or monosodium glutamate, is a flavor enhancer commonly added to processed foods. It's a sodium salt of glutamic acid, an amino acid.

warnings: May cause neurological effects at high doses or chronic exposure, including memory impairment and neuronal injury (particularly in animal models)
May contribute to obesity and metabolic dysfunction through appetite dysregulation and altered hypothalamic signaling
May induce kidney damage at high doses or prolonged intake
May trigger transient symptoms (headache, flushing) in sensitive individuals when consumed in large amounts without food

research_papers.title: Monosodium glutamate as a tool to reduce sodium in foodstuffs: Technological and safety aspects
Characterization of a Potential Probiotic Lactobacillus brevis RK03 and Efficient Production of γ-Aminobutyric Acid in Batch Fermentation
Worldwide flavor enhancer monosodium glutamate combined with high lipid diet provokes metabolic alterations and systemic anomalies: An overview

ingredients.name: Palm Oil
ingredients.description: Palm oil is a vegetable oil extracted from the fruit of the oil palm tree.  It's used widely in food and other industries.

research_papers.title: Coconut (Cocos nucifera L.: Arecaceae): In health promotion and disease prevention

ingredients.name: Cocoa Powder
ingredients.description: Cocoa powder is a product of processed cocoa beans, often used in baking and confectionery for its rich flavor and color.

ingredients.name: Whey Protein Concentrate

ingredients.name: Skim Milk

ingredients.name: Soy Lecithin

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.description: Salt, primarily sodium chloride, is a common seasoning and preservative used in food preparation and preservation.

ingredients.name: Natural Flavors
ingredients.description: Natural flavors are flavoring agents derived from natural sources like plants, fruits, or spices, enhancing the taste and aroma of food.

ingredients.name: BHT
